forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon sun casts a warm glow across Downtown San Francisco, inviting a sense of calm and serenity. With temperatures hovering close to 67 degrees and a gentle west wind at 14 mph, the city enjoys a mostly sunny outlook, punctuated by occasional gusts that speak of the Bay's ever-changing nature. Though a few clouds wander lazily across the sky, their presence is barely enough to dim the overarching brightness. It is a clear day, yet hints of the marine layer linger in the distance, especially as one gazes from the hills toward the Golden Gate Bridge—its iconic towers rising through a delicate veil of fog that whispers tales of ocean depth.

As evening approaches, the temperature will gracefully settle to about 58 degrees, offering a mild embrace against the cooling air. The partly cloudy sky adds an air of mystery, suggesting a comforting twilight—a perfect backdrop for casual strolls along Embarcadero or seeking solace in one of the many cozy cafés tucked away in the Mission. As the day wanes, a light jacket or sweater serves as the ideal companion, keeping the evening chill at bay, while lending an air of ease to the day's end. Engaging with the vibrant atmosphere of the city — perhaps browsing a local bookstore or enjoying a quiet dinner al fresco — presents a delightful way to enjoy this golden moment in San Francisco.
